column4: I installed php 5.0, apache2 and mysql... But when i will open a file index.php, for example, the browser always asks me if i want to download that file ... what should i do, please ... ?!
grep: /etc/apache2/mods-enabled/php5.conf: No such file or directory .... it says it when i wnat to restart apache2
